definition: (number of) degrees of freedom (physics and statistics)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Based on the six-freedom-degree ballistic equations, the model of air to ground submunition in the terminal guidance stage was established.
sentences.chinese: 利用六自由度动力学模型对末段弹道进行了仿真。

sentences.english: A novel 3-DOF reducible translational parallel mechanism is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型三自由度移动可约并联机构。

sentences.english: A new way is off-ered for image-stabilizing involving three degrees of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 为多自由度稳像提供了新的途径。

sentences.english: This new stiffened plate element has the same degree of freedom as regular plate elements.
sentences.chinese: 任意加筋板单元具有和常规板单元相同的自由度。

sentences.english: That's a line. I have one degree of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 这是一条曲线，我有一个自由度。

sentences.english: And how do we balance that with the freedom of speech?
sentences.chinese: 以及我们如何权衡演说的自由度？

sentences.english: Calculate out total uncertain degree and degree of freedom of the manometer .
sentences.chinese: 计算出压力表的总的不确定度和自由度。

sentences.english: Simulation results verify the effectiveness of the six-degree-of-freedom controller.
sentences.chinese: 仿真结果验证了六自由度控制的有效性。

sentences.english: Because each atom has 3N degrees of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 因为每个原子有3个自由度。

sentences.english: Each atom has three degrees of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 每个原子有三个自由度。

sentences.english: The analyses show that for systems of few-degrees-of-freedom, there is little difference between the results of the above two methods.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现，对于少自由度系统来说，两者相差不多。

sentences.english: Then a new design of multiple-freedom simulator for RVD is provided.
sentences.chinese: 其次提出一种新的多自由度交会对接仿真器方案。

sentences.english: So we have two degrees of freedom.
sentences.chinese: 那么我们有两个自由度。

sentences.english: That freedom is a better high than anything I could have bought in a store.
sentences.chinese: 那份自由度比我在商店里买到的任何东西都来得大些。

sentences.english: But Japan is no paradise for men in search of trichological freedom.
sentences.chinese: 但据发型自由度研究表明，日本并非男人的天堂。

sentences.english: This model can be used in others multi-DOFs stage.
sentences.chinese: 该模型可用于其它多自由度运动台的运动控制中。

definition: ability to make one's own decisions
to play fast and loose with the law/to game the system/(leisure) rules of the game/way of doing an activity/(tourism) way of experiencing a place
